actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill providing for the construction of a flood control project on the Chehalis River, Wash.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct the flood control project on the Chehalis River in Washington, at an estimated Federal cost of $10,529,000.

titles.title: A bill providing for the construction of a flood control project on the Chehalis River, Wash.
